valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 11 Nov 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 12 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low Fair Isle 992 losing its identity by 1800 Tuesday. Atlantic low expected 200 miles west of Shannon 977
